title.name: Title
notes: Last, First

_id.name: ID
notes: any field where the key starts with an underscore is generated by WiX
...and cannot be altered for any given record or deleted from the table

_owner.name: Owner
notes: any field where the key starts with an underscore is generated by WiX
...and cannot be altered for any given record or deleted from the table

_createdDate.name: Created Date
notes: any field where the key starts with an underscore is generated by WiX
...and cannot be altered for any given record or deleted from the table

_updatedDate.name: Updated Date
notes: any field where the key starts with an underscore is generated by WiX
...and cannot be altered for any given record or deleted from the table

idPP.name: Primary Parent ID
idPP.source: WiX Velo by way of automated Parent Membership
idPP.usage: used to connect Parent with Member with any and all Enrollments for her/his children
notes: either dynamically created, or identified as part of the Enrollment process

idFM.name: Family ID
idFM.usage: used to connect Parent with Member with any and all Enrollments for her/his children
notes: from the perspective of the Student there is only ONE Family
same as idPP for simplicity accross tables
for extensibility, notwithstanding apparent redundancy

idHH.name: Household ID
idHH.usage: used to connect Parent with Member with any and all Enrollments for her/his children
notes: from the perspective of the Student the _First_ HH _is_ the PP's HH'
therefore, same as idPP for simplicity accross tables
for extensibility, notwithstanding apparent redundancy

idBL.name: Billing ID
idBL.usage: used to connect Parent with Member with any and all Enrollments for her/his children
notes: ONLY for PP Person at present
this exists for putative use as billing gets more complicated
by way of _being_ PP there is implied Billing 'ownership'
for present it will be ignored, but maybe divorced couple both pay half etc.
for extensibility, notwithstanding apparent redundancy

idWix.name: Wix ID
idWix.source: Either Wix ContactID or Wix MemberID
idWix.usage: used for individual CRM tasks with individuals NOT the PP
notes: ONLY for PP Person at present
since PP _is_ a Member, the Contact/Member ID is expected to be identical
if at a later time we _can_ extract a ContactID, we will _here_
however, it may be that this value is _unused_ until we assign Students (others) as Members
since, it appears that ContactID and MemberID are identical, no change when become Members
...NOTE: CodeQueen says there are exceptions, so watch this
NOT the '_id' value of this table

role.name: Role
role.usage: determines query behavior, notwithstanding the intentional redundancy of IDs
notes: LOGIC not this database will limit the values
... it would be good if this were updated as the Logic progresses
at this time ALL parents other than PP are SP's (step parents, estranged parents, etc.)

firstLegal.name: First Legal
notes: human legal identification
as opposed to 'preferred'
...which we use

fullName.name: Full Name
notes: first + ' ' + last

lastFirst.name: Last First
notes: last + ', ' + first

comboName.name: Combo Name
notes: perhaps null other than students
perhaps some combo-couple name for parents, but not critical
perhaps something else for other roles

jsonData.name: Person Data JSON
jsonData.usage: holds the JSON of the superEnrollemntObject for the subset for this person
notes: this is everything we know from the superEnrollemntObject
it is expected that this will be a single element from the superEnrollemntObject
... however, it could be that some data needs to be gathered elsewhere, none at outset

jsonCorollary.name: Corollary JSON
jsonCorollary.source: any indicated source, none (empty object brackets) at onset, see notes
notes: since the enrollmentJSON is the Holy Grail, there needs to be a place for any number of additional datapoints
other than PP and Studeent, none at first so an empty object will be iserted
Student: courseArray[]
Primary Parent: much of the Contact Info (under family{} in superEnrollemntObject)

jsonStatusNotes.name: Status Notes JSON
jsonStatusNotes.usage: discrete values to describe the status of the Enrollment (and notes)

notes: by design, the First element is _always_ the most recent Status
by design, the Last element is _always_ the most recent Note
LOGIC not this database will limit the values
... it would be good if this were updated as the Logic progresses
different values by 'role'
1st Draft
'raw' is everything that was in enrollmentObjects value here
notes are unlimited, so below only putative Statuses
primaryParent: of course, this can be anything
...but the idea a collection of one word values that succicntly capture the, well, Status
student: of course, this can be anything
...but the idea a collection of one word values that succicntly capture the, well, Status
RAW: of course, this can be anything
...but the idea a collection of one word values that succicntly capture the, well, Status

tableNotes: source is 'enrollmentObject record' for nearly all attributes
...this does not exclude additions and edits by _other_ mechanisms
